item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

client sided; client.java

under inputString = "::" + inputString;

add

				[code]	if(inputString.equals("::noclip"))
					{
						for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++)
						{
							for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++)
							{
								for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
									aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

							}

						}

					}[/code]

item.title: How to add ::noclip on: Trisidiax v2?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

No clip has to deal with the client. It allows you to walk through objects built in the client.
But if you want you can add this to your commands for shiggles:
-Ignore Conventions, typing code in reply box

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip"){
     if(c.playerRights < 2){
           c.sendMessage("Hey you're not allowed to noclip!");
           c.disconnected = true;//I don't think this is right?
     }else{
          c.sendMessage("You're now Noclipping like a badass!");
     }
}

Read full topic
